headline: The Trade Desk faces rising competition ahead of Q4 earnings report
summary: The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) is set to report its fourth quarter results on Wednesday, and analysts at Wedbush say the company is likely to post continued growth while facing mounting competitive pressures. The firm maintained a ‘Neutral’ rating on the stock and lowered its 12-month price...

headline: ARK Unplugged: How Cathie Wood Crushed the S&P 500 in 2025
summary: ARK's 2025 winners included Robinhood, AMD and Palantir, while its losers were The Trade Desk, Recursion and Twist.

headline: The Trade Desk Introduces the Ventura Ecosystem to Advance the Future of CTV Advertising; V and Nexxen Join as the First Collaborators
summary: VENTURA, Calif., February 24, 2026--Today, The Trade Desk’s Ventura, the platform built for a fairer and more transparent streaming ecosystem, takes the next step in its vision to optimize programmatic advertising in connected TV (CTV) with the launch of the Ventura Ecosystem. The Ventura Ecosystem is an industry collaboration that brings global TV operating systems and streaming platforms together to create a more transparent and revenue‑optimized marketplace, so the industry can continue to gr

headline: Wedbush Maintains Neutral on Trade Desk, Lowers Price Target to $23
summary: Wedbush  analyst Alicia Reese   maintains Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) with a Neutral and lowers the price target from $40 to $23.

headline: What To Expect From The Trade Desk’s (TTD) Q4 Earnings
summary: Digital advertising platform The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) will be announcing earnings results this Wednesday after market close. Here’s what to look for.
